acts.act: Protection of Children from Sexual Offence Act, 2012

business_details.Business: Progress report.
Case Record without case diary is received on transfer from Hon&#039ble Special Judge, Tinsukia for trial. Seen and perused the Progress report submitted by I.O.
Accused Abdul Kasam is produced from jail hajot. F.F. is nto submitted  by I.O. Issue reminder.
Accused is produced from jail hajot. C.D. is received and send to Ld. C.J. M. Tinsukia to prepare copy. Accused is remanded back to jail custody till.
Accused is produced from jail hajot. F.F. is not submitted by I.O.
Accused Abdul Kashem is present with appointed new lawyer. Accused Md. Sahidul and Md. Kayam are absent. Issue summon to them. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder.
Accused Abdul Kasam is absent with step. Accused Md. Sahidul and Md. Kayam are absent. Issue fresh summon to the accused. F.F. is not submitted by I.O.
Accused Abdul Kesham is present. Accused Md. Sahidul and Md. Kayam are absent. Issue fresh summon to them. F.F. is nto submitted by I.O. Issue reminder.

Accused Abdul Kashem is present. Accused Md. Sahidul and Md. GKayan are absent. Issue fresh summon to them. A letter of intimation dtd. 18-01-19 submitted by I.O. Pratap Gogoi and praying time for submission of F.F.
Accused Abdul Kushen is present. Accused Md. Sahidul and Md. Kayan are absent. Issue fresh summon to them. F.F. is not submtted by I.O. Issue reminder.
Accused Abdul Kushen is present. Accused Sahidul and Kayan are absent. Issue fresh summon to them. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder.
Accused Abdul Kusham is absent with step. Accused Sahidul and Kayam are absent. Issue fresh summons to both the accused. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder. Fix for F.F. and appearance.
Accused Abdul Keshem is present. Accused Sahidul and Kayan are absent. Summon is not returned. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue fresh reminder.
Accused Abdul Keshem is present. Accused Sahidul and Kayam are absent. Summon is not returned. Issue fresh summon to both accused. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder.
Accused Abdul Kashem is absent with step. Accused Sahidul and Kayam are absent . Summon is not returned. Issue fresh summon to both the accused. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder.
Accused Abdul Kashem is present. Accused Sahidul and Kalyan are absent. Issue fresh summon to both the accused. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder.

P.O. is on casual leave. Case record is put up before District Judge, Tinsukia.  Accused Abdul Kashem is present. Accused Sahidul and Kalyan are absent. Issue fresh summon both of them. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder.
Accused Abdul Kesham is present. Accused Sahidul and Kalyan are absent. Issue fresh summons both of them. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder to submit F.F.
Accused Abdul Kashem is absent with step. Accused Sahidul and Kalyan are absent. Issue fresh summon both of them. F.F is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder to submit F.F.
Accused Abdul Kashem is present. Accused Sahidul and Kalyan are absent. Issue fresh summon to accused person. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue fresh reminder to submits F.F.

P.O. is on training. CR is put up before Civil Judge, Tinsukia.  Accused Abdul Kashem is absent. Shown cause of reason. Accused Sahidul and Kalyan are absent. Issue fresh summon  both the accused person. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder.
Accused Abdul Kashem is prsent. Accused Sahidul and Kalyan are absent. Issue fresh summon to against both the accused. F.F. is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder.

P.O. has been  transferred vide notification no. HC.VII-167 (Pt.-VI)2014/7826/A of Hon&#039ble Gauhati High Court. CR is put up before District Judge, Tinsukia. Accused Abdul Kashem is absent. Files petition shown cause of reason. Prayer is allowed. Accused Sahidul and Kalyan are absent. Issue fresh summons against the both the accused persons. FF is not submitted by I.O. Issue reminder.
P.O. has been transferred. Accused Abdul Kashem is absent. Accused are not allowedto enter in the court campus to prevention of Corna virus.
